item.title: [Network]traceroute
item.description: This post was written for studying. There maybe a lot wrong going on. 목차 How does the traceroute work? How does the traceroute work? Traceroute is a network diagnostic tool used to trace the route that packets take from one host to another across a network. It works by sending a series of packets, each with an increasing Time to Live (TTL) value, towards the destination host. Here’s how traceroute works step by step:
